programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: On the last day of the cruise, a romantic celebration unfolds at sea with help from Hallmark Stars; Laura lands a life-changing opportunity, and passengers enjoy a final day of fun, laughter, and unforgettable holiday memories.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Lily's Destiny
programme.desc: With holiday responsibilities piling up, gift-wrapping shop owner Lily eagerly accepts a date with a handsome local realtor. But will he be the one that sweeps her off her feet? Stars Ashley Newbrough, Torrance Coombs.

programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.desc: Desperate to make it back home in time for the Christmas Gala, Olivia gets snowed-in with her ex-boyfriend while delivering gifts.

programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van must run interference at a client party after Reba takes a pill, by mistake, that will make her violently ill if she drinks alcohol.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean signs Reba up for an online dating service, Reba winds up dating a mystery man and spending less time with the family.

programme.desc: When Reba teams up with Van to invest in real estate, he buys an uninspected house, which prompts her to want out of their partnership.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne asks Reba to talk some sense into Van when he stops going to church, but when Reba's efforts fail, she takes her problem straight to the church's handsome new minister (Patrick Fabian).

programme.desc: Rose must look for work after she loses her grief-counseling job.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates welcome Rose's recently blinded sister, whose independent manner is deceptive.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche panics when her father reveals his outlandish plans for the future.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy, Rose and Blanche reminisce about how they all came to live together.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind elementary school teacher meets an optometrist who helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: Sydney decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. When she meets Mac, he tries to make her Christmas wishes come true by helping her open herself up to life, love, and believing in the spirit of Christmas again.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.
